string.name: address
string.br: Ara Garden Road, Jagdeo Path, opp. Pillar no-4 \n

string.name: about
string.p: This centre is established with the vision to provide a working space and pleasant environment for students, researchers, and scientists to work on fresh ideas and solve persistent societal challenges through innovations. Our goal is to provide a physical space and facilities to those researchers who strive for excellence.

We want to break the barrier called “Lack of Facility and Opportunity” and want to connect with those who despite having excellent ideas and capability but miss out chance for executing their skills and showcasing at world level.

We believe that success can only be achieved by identifying the right opportunity at the right time and striving for it with passionate persistency. We put our effort mainly on harnessing know-how in technology sector and assist in finding solutions. We have a dedicated team of researchers with experience who works in searching and bringing out the best opportunities across the globe and ensuring it its responsibility to make it as simple and easy to access thereby connecting opportunity seekers and opportunity providers before deadline.
